trans-unit.source: Interactively controls a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Controlla in modo interattivo un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a ClockController to interactively begin, pause, resume, seek, skip, stop, and remove a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare un ClockController per iniziare, sospendere, riprendere, cercare, ignorare, arrestare e rimuovere un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> in modo interattivo

trans-unit.source: You can only interactively control root-level clocks.
trans-unit.target: È possibile controllare solo in modo interattivo gli orologi di livello radice.

trans-unit.source: Sets the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*> to begin at the next tick.
trans-unit.target: Imposta la destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*>inizi al tick successivo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*>

trans-unit.source: This method causes the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> to behave as though its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> object's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> were set to the time of the next tick.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo determina la destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>si comporterà come se il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>dell'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>sono state impostate sull'ora del segno di graduazione successivo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: The timeline's actual <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> setting is ignored (but not changed).
trans-unit.target: La sequenza temporale dell'effettiva <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>impostazione viene ignorata (ma non modificata).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method changes the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo modifica <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>per <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> dell'orologio di destinazione</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Begin method does not resume a paused clock.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Begin non riprende un clock sospeso.

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non ha effetto sull'albero di temporizzazione fino alla successiva che elaborazione di un segno di graduazione.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events will also not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: Come effetto collaterale, gli eventi appropriati anche non essere generati fino a quel momento.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo avvia la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> controlled by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> controllato da questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> controlled by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> controllato da questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Stops the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> from progressing.
trans-unit.target: Arresta la destinazione <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> dall'avanzamento.

trans-unit.source: You can pause a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> regardless of its current state, and pausing a clock does not change its current state.
trans-unit.target: È possibile sospendere un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>indipendentemente dal relativo stato corrente e la sospensione non modificherà lo stato corrente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: A clock can be paused while <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: Un clock può essere sospeso mentre <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>

trans-unit.source: The only way to unpause a clock is by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Resume%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: L'unico modo per riattivare un clock è utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Resume%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Resume%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pausing a clock implicitly pauses its children.
trans-unit.target: La sospensione di un orologio in modo implicito, viene sospeso nei relativi elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method when the target clock is already paused has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo quando l'orologio di destinazione è già in pausa non ha alcun effetto.

trans-unit.source: Pausing a clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: La sospensione di un clock genera il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref> from the properties it animates.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> associato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref> dalle proprietà di cui aggiunge un'animazione.

trans-unit.source: The clock and its child clocks will no longer affect these properties.
trans-unit.target: L'orologio e gli elementi figlio non verranno più applicate queste proprietà.

trans-unit.source: This method triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.RemoveRequested> event.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo attiva il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.RemoveRequested>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.RemoveRequested>

trans-unit.source: Enables a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was previously paused to resume progressing.
trans-unit.target: Consente un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> precedentemente sospeso di riprendere l'avanzamento.

trans-unit.source: You can pause or resume a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> regardless of its current state, and pausing or resuming a clock does not change its current state.
trans-unit.target: È possibile sospendere o riprendere un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>indipendentemente dal relativo stato corrente e la sospensione o ripresa non modificherà lo stato corrente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: A clock can be paused while <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: Un clock può essere sospeso mentre <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>

trans-unit.source: The only way to resume a paused clock is by using the Resume method.
trans-unit.target: L'unico modo per riprendere un clock sospeso è tramite il metodo Resume.

trans-unit.source: Resuming a clock implicitly resumes its children.
trans-unit.target: Ripresa in modo implicito un orologio riprende nei relativi elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method on a clock that is not paused has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo su un orario in formato non sospeso non ha alcun effetto.

trans-unit.source: Resuming a paused clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: Ripresa di un trigger di clock messo in pausa il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Seeks the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*> by the specified amount when the next tick occurs.
trans-unit.target: Cerca il tipo di destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*>base al valore specificato quando si verifica il tick successivo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*>

trans-unit.source: If the target clock is stopped, seeking makes it active again.
trans-unit.target: Se l'orologio di destinazione viene arrestato, la ricerca lo riattiva di nuovo.

trans-unit.source: Seek operations do not take the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings of this clock's timeline into account: the clock is treated as though its timeline has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ricerca operazioni non accettano la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>in considerazione le impostazioni di temporale questa sequenza: l'orologio viene trattato come se la sequenza temporale abbia un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>pari a 1 e nessun <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method changes the clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo modifica <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>per <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> dell'orologio</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non ha effetto sull'albero di temporizzazione fino alla successiva che elaborazione di un segno di graduazione.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events also will not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: Come effetto collaterale, gli eventi appropriati anche non essere generati fino a quel momento.

trans-unit.source: Seeking a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: La ricerca di uno storyboard di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: If the target clock has children, their current time is updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Se l'orologio di destinazione dispone di figli, viene aggiornato di conseguenza l'ora corrente.

trans-unit.source: The seek offset, measured in the target clock's time.
trans-unit.target: L'offset della ricerca, misurata nel tempo dell'orologio di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: This offset is relative to the clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref>, depending on the value of `origin`.
trans-unit.target: Questo offset è relativo l'orologio <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref>, a seconda del valore di `origin`.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the specified offset is relative to the target clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica se l'offset specificato è relativo dell'orologio di destinazione <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Seeks the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> by the specified amount immediately.
trans-unit.target: Cerca il tipo di destinazione <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> da immediatamente la quantità specificata.

trans-unit.source: If the target clock is stopped, seeking makes it active again.
trans-unit.target: Se l'orologio di destinazione viene arrestato, la ricerca lo riattiva di nuovo.

trans-unit.source: Seek operations do not take the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings of this clock's timeline into account: the clock is treated as though its timeline has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ricerca operazioni non accettano la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>in considerazione le impostazioni di temporale questa sequenza: l'orologio viene trattato come se la sequenza temporale abbia un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>pari a 1 e nessun <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: SeekAlignedToLastTick aligns the seeked time of the clock with the last clock tick.
trans-unit.target: SeekAlignedToLastTick Allinea il tempo ricercato del clock con l'ultimo ciclo macchina.

trans-unit.source: Values are immediately updated to reflect the changes due to SeekAlignedToLastTick, even though the screen will not reflect these changes until the screen updates.
trans-unit.target: I valori vengono immediatamente aggiornati per riflettere le modifiche a causa di SeekAlignedToLastTick, anche se la schermata non rifletterà le modifiche fino a quando gli aggiornamenti dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: If the target clock has children, their current time is updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Se l'orologio di destinazione dispone di figli, viene aggiornato di conseguenza l'ora corrente.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo modifica <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>per <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> dell'orologio</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Seeking a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: La ricerca di uno storyboard di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: The seek offset, measured in the target clock's time.
trans-unit.target: L'offset della ricerca, misurata nel tempo dell'orologio di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: This offset is relative to the clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref>, depending on the value of `origin`.
trans-unit.target: Questo offset è relativo l'orologio <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref>, a seconda del valore di `origin`.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the specified offset is relative to the target clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica se l'offset specificato è relativo dell'orologio di destinazione <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Advances the current time of the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> to the end of its active period.
trans-unit.target: Sposta l'ora corrente della destinazione <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> alla fine del periodo attivo.

trans-unit.source: This method advances the target clock's current time to the end of its active period; the clock's behavior at this point is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> setting of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo fa avanzare l'orologio di destinazione ora corrente alla fine del periodo attivo; a questo punto, il comportamento del clock è specificato dall' <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A>impostazione del relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>, the clock fills; if the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>, the clock stops.
trans-unit.target: Se la sequenza temporale <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>, riempie l'orologio; se la proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>, interrompe l'orologio.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has an effect only if the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non ha effetto solo se <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>è <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> dell'orologio di destinazione</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non ha effetto sull'albero di temporizzazione fino alla successiva che elaborazione di un segno di graduazione.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events also will not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: Come effetto collaterale, gli eventi appropriati anche non essere generati fino a quel momento.

trans-unit.source: Advancing a storyboard to its fill period triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Spostare uno storyboard per il riempimento trigger periodo il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interactive speed of the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la velocità interattiva della destinazione <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect until the next tick.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione di questa proprietà non ha alcun effetto fino a quando il tick successivo.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property and then get its value before the next tick occurs, you'll get the old value.
trans-unit.target: Se si imposta questa proprietà e quindi ottenere il relativo valore prima si verifica il tick successivo, si otterrà il valore precedente.

trans-unit.source: This property will return the new value after the next tick.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituirà il nuovo valore dopo il tick successivo.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not change the value of the underlying timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione di questa proprietà non modifica il valore sottostante della sequenza temporale <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property triggers the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione di questa proprietà attiva dell'orologio di destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: A finite value greater than zero that describes the interactive speed of the target clock.
trans-unit.target: Un valore finito maggiore di zero che descrive la velocità interattiva dell'orologio di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: This value is multiplied against the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio*> of the clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>. For example, if the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio*> is 0.5 and the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref> object's SpeedRatio is 3.0, the timeline moves at 1.5 times normal speed (0.5 * 3.0).
trans-unit.target: Questo valore viene moltiplicato per il valore di <> </> *> dell'orologio <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref>. Ad esempio, se la sequenza temporale <> </> *> è 0,5 e <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref> SpeedRatio dell'oggetto è 3.0, la sequenza temporale si sposta a 1,5 volte la velocità normale (0,5 * 3,0).

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Stops the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Arresta la destinazione <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo modifica <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>per <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> dell'orologio di destinazione</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> clock can be restarted by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Seek%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>clock può essere riavviato utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Seek%2A>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Seek%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non ha effetto sull'albero di temporizzazione fino alla successiva che elaborazione di un segno di graduazione.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events also will not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: Come effetto collaterale, gli eventi appropriati anche non essere generati fino a quel momento.

trans-unit.source: Stopping a clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: L'arresto di un orologio di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>degli eventi, ma non il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>
